translator

Class CypherTokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • translator.CypherTokenizer

  • public class CypherTokenizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates tokens from the Cypher input. Uses ANTLRv4 tool.

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        public static DecodedQuery decode(java.lang.String cypher,
                                  boolean DEBUG_PRINT)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Takes Cypher query as input and returns a DecodedQuery object representing it.
        Parameters:
        cypher - Cypher input.
        DEBUG_PRINT - Print out debug statements or not.
        Returns:
        DecodedQuery object representing the Cypher input.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Error somewhere.

      • getTokenList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTokenList(java.lang.String cyp,
                                                                 boolean DEBUG_PRINT)
        Extract the token list from the Cypher input. Uses ANTLR classes to perform this. Some tokens are excluded, such as EOF and semi colons.
        Parameters:
        cyp - Cypher input as text.
        DEBUG_PRINT - Print out debug statements or not.
        Returns:
        A list of tokens as deciphered by the ANTLR classes, based on the openCypher grammar.
